title: In Retrial, Man Who Helped Run Border Wall Charity Is Convicted
description: Timothy Shea was the only one of four defendants in the federal case to face a jury. The former Trump adviser Stephen K. Bannon faces similar charges in state court.
dc:creator: Colin Moynihan

media:content.media:description: Timothy Shea was a central figure in raising $25 million for a barrier separating the United States from Mexico.
